title: The Rise of Derivatives - Brought to you by CME Group
content: The Block’s Director of News, Frank Chaparro, along side CME Group and industry experts from Tradestation, and Ninja Trading, for a live webinar and Q&A session discussed recent trends in the crypto derivatives marketplace and what’s to come in the second half of 2021.
Watch the video above to learn more about what our panelists have to say.
Tim McCourt – Managing Director and Global Head of Equity Products and Alternative Investments, CME Group
Peter Korotkiy – Chief Brokerage Officer, Tradestation
Brooks Dudley – Global Head of Digital Assets, ED&F Man
